entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
